about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey in the fantastical realm of Fantasy Shootoff, a free PvPvE fantasy game where you fight against enemy creatures and bosses, use crazy weapons, experience a thrilling story, and hang out with your friends on one big map. Play Single player and quest through the secrets of the island and level up your character or jump into Multiplayer and kill enemies with your friends. Fantasy Shootoff is constantly being updated so be ready.

Fantasy Shootoff takes place on a visually appealing map that is constantly changing with every new chapter and season.

Fantasy Shootoff has a large variety of different weapons, consumables, and Armor to pick from. Every item has its own special stats to fit that item.

Fantasy Shootoff's storyline always includes fighting enemy threats to protect a very special artifact known as the "Gem Of Life". Some enemy's are weak and some are very strong. 

Fantasy Shootoff has a complex and thrilling storyline that drives the center of the game. The Gem Of Life, the island, the Assault Team, and the I.C.E are key factors of the game's storyline.
detailed_description:
About Fantasy Shootoff

What Is Fantasy Shootoff?

Fantasy Shootoff is a free PvPvE fantasy game where you fight against enemy npcs or have a duel with your friends on one big map filled with crazy weapons, story and much more. Play Single player and level up your character or jump into Multiplayer and kill enemies or just hang out. Fantasy Shootoff is constantly being updated so be ready. In Fantasy Shootoff there are seasons and chapters. Unlike most games, Fantasy Shootoff's seasons last for one whole year and in each season there is 7-8 chapters. Chapters are about 2-3 months long. Chapters usually bring small map changes like adding new POI's, they also add new items and weapons to match the different themes for each chapter and they bring new story elements.

History of Operation Games

Operation Games was started by Steven Benoit Jr in 2020, at the time he was 12 years old. Steven loved to play video games and he always used to wonder how they where made. When he got his first PC he started looking up how to program. He started learning Unity, but he didn't like that way of programing, he wanted something easy for beginner's. After a while Steven started using Unreal Engine 4. He liked the easy viewport and blueprint programing. Steven then thought about putting together a small team to help him make video games. So at school he asked his friends and they all wanted to help. So they called the team "Epic Crazy Games". But that was to familiar with "Epic Games". So Steven renamed the team to "Operation Games".


FAQ

Fantasy Shootoff's Frequently Asked Questions

What rating is Fantasy Shootoff?

Fantasy Shootoff is rated Teen 14+ for Fantasy Violence and Users Interact.

How often will the game update?

Fantasy Shootoff will receive regular updates that include improvements, balancing and fixes. We’ll keep you updated as to what that content looks like as we move through the new seasons and chapters.

How long do seasons and chapters last?

Most chapters last about 2-3 months, seasons will last about a year depending on how many chapters there are.

How do I download Fantasy Shootoff?

To download Fantasy Shootoff go to the Steam store page and add it to your library and press the download button and wait for it to finish and start playing.

How do I find my IP Address for multiplayer?

Open the command prompt and type "ipconfig" and press enter then your IP address will appear.

Fantasy Shootoff takes place on a visually appealing map that is constantly changing with every new chapter and season.

Fantasy Shootoff has a large variety of different weapons, consumables, and Armor to pick from. Every item has its own special stats to fit that item.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5-9400F/Ryzen 3750H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050/RX 560
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i7-9400F/Ryzen 7 5700u
  • Memory: 36 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3080/RX 590
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
